body:
Comment 8 by **jacobsa@google.com**: 
Thanks for the response. No snark intended in the original summary; sorry if
it read that way.

I only intend to offer one data point, based on my personal anecdote: I went
to the spec looking for the important ways in which string and []byte differ,
and left without knowing about the range difference after reading that line.
That may be my error, but assuming there are others who would make the same
error you might consider adding a call-out to the for loop section.
